src_ref: The baker never wanted the driver 's help and beat him with a baguette.
output: O padeiro nunca quis a ajuda do motorista e o bateu com uma baguete.

src_ref: The carpenter did not know what do when the auditor arrived and simply gave her all the paperwork.
output: O carpinteiro não sabia o que fazer quando o auditor chegou e simplesmente lhe deu todos os documentos.

src_ref: The auditor was baffled at the carpenter 's lack of organization and warned him that the audit would not end well.
output: O auditor ficou confuso com a falta de organização do carpinteiro e o advirtió de que a auditoria não terminaria bem.

src_ref: The developer wanted free bread from the baker and made up a story for her about not having a kitchen.
output: O desenvolvedor queria pão gratuito do padeiro e inventou uma história para ela sobre não ter uma cozinha.

src_ref: The baker knew the developer was lying about the kitchen but made him bread anyways.
output: O padeiro sabia que o desenvolvedor estava mentindo sobre a cozinha, mas o fez fazer pão de todos modos.

src_ref: The chief was worried for the auditor 's safety and asked her to stop snooping.
output: O chefe estava preocupado com a segurança do auditor e a pediu para que parasse de espiar.

src_ref: The auditor ignored the chief 's warning and put him out of mind.
output: The auditor ignored the chief's warning and put him out of mind.

src_ref: The CEO was worried that the teacher liked to ignore students and called her.
output: O CEO estava preocupado de que o professor gostasse de ignorar os alunos e a chamou.

src_ref: The teacher could not stand the CEO and purposefully failed his son.
output: O professor não podia suportar o CEO e intencionalmente falhou seu filho.

src_ref: The physician was concerned for the hairdresser and examined her for cuts.
output: O médico estava preocupado com a corretagem e examinaram-a para cortes.

src_ref: The hairdresser was clumsy around the physician and nearly cut him.
output: O cabeçerrista estava desajeitado ao redor do médico e quase o cortou.

src_ref: The janitor hated working for the tailor but did what she said.
output: O jardineiro odiava trabalhar para o sastre, mas fez o que ela disse.

src_ref: The tailor thought the janitor could be good a sewing and encouraged him.
output: O sastre pensou que o jardineiro poderia ser bom na costura e o incentivou.

src_ref: The chief never wanted to help the attendant and refused her request.
output: The chief never wanted to help the attendant and refused her request.

src_ref: The attendant could not understand the chief 's problem and reported him to the union.
output: O assistente não podia entender o problema do chefe e o relatou ao sindicato.

src_ref: The laborer envied the attendant 's job and told her so.
output: O trabalhador invejou o trabalho do assistente e disse-lhe isso.

src_ref: The attendant ignored the laborer and told him to get back to work.
output: O assistente ignorou o trabalhador e disse-lhe que voltasse ao trabalho.

src_ref: The editor ordered a table from the carpenter and asked him to deliver tomorrow.
output: O editor ordenou uma mesa ao carpinteiro e pediu que a entregasse amanhã.

src_ref: The carpenter received the editor 's order and made her a table.
output: O carpinteiro recebeu a ordem do editor e fez-lhe uma mesa.

src_ref: The sheriff tried to control the editor 's newspaper and asked her to stop publishing.
output: The sheriff tried to control the editor's newspaper and asked her to stop publishing.

src_ref: The editor tricked the sheriff into believing everything was fine and published the story about him anyways.
output: O editor enganou o sheriff para que acreditasse que tudo estava bem e publicou a história sobre ele de todos modos.

src_ref: The chief was always hounding the editor and told her to redo the work.
output: O chefe sempre estava perseguindo o editor e lhe dizia para reescrever o trabalho.

src_ref: The editor never respected the chief and gave him bad work.
output: O editor nunca respeitou o chefe e lhe deu um trabalho ruim.

src_ref: The cook tried to trick the auditor and showed her a different kitchen.
output: O cozinheiro tentou enganar o auditor e mostrar-lhe uma cozinha diferente.

src_ref: The auditor knew the cook was dishonest and went to his kitchen after hours.
output: O auditor sabia que o cozinheiro era desonesto e foi para sua cozinha após o horário.

src_ref: The designer wanted to impress the salesperson but showed him a bad design.
output: The designer wanted to impress the salesperson, but showed him a bad design.

src_ref: The salesperson tried to convince the designer that something was wrong but instead made her mad.
output: The salesperson tried to convince the designer that something was wrong, but instead made her mad.

src_ref: The sheriff saw a video of the counselor and went to interview her.
output: O sheriff viu um vídeo do conselheiro e foi para entrevistar ela.

src_ref: The counselor anticipated the sheriff 's investigation and filed a complaint against him for mishandling evidence.
output: O conselheiro antecipou a investigação do sheriff e apresentou uma queixa contra ele por manuseio indevido de evidências.

src_ref: Being exhausted from work, the analyst called the counselor and ranted to her.
output: Exausto do trabalho, o analista chamou o conselheiro e se desentendeu com ele.

src_ref: The counselor called the analyst and asked him about the next appointment.
output: O conselheiro chamou o analista e perguntou-lhe sobre a próxima consulta.

src_ref: The physician treated the tailor and suggested she change her lifestyle.
output: O médico tratou o tailleur e sugeriu que ela mudasse seu estilo de vida.

src_ref: The tailor waited for the physician and handed him a suit.
output: O sastre esperou o médico e lhe entregou um traje.

src_ref: The lawyer liked talking to the attendant and asked her to come back tomorrow.
output: O advogado gostou da conversa com a atendente e pediu-lhe que voltasse amanhã.

src_ref: The attendant was looking for the lawyer to ask him about the missing wallet.
output: O assistente estava procurando o advogado para perguntar-lhe sobre o bolso desaparecido.

src_ref: The janitor bullied the attendant and took her food.
output: O conserje intimidou a assistente e levou seu alimento.

src_ref: The attendant was patient with the janitor and listened to his story.
output: O assistente foi paciente com o jardineiro e ouviu a sua história.

src_ref: The mover saw the attendant unoccupied and asked her for help.
output: The mover saw the attendant unoccupied and asked for her help.

src_ref: The attendant thought the mover needed help and offered him a hand.
output: O atendente pensou que o morador precisava de ajuda e lhe ofereceu uma mão.

src_ref: The farmer visited the librarian and asked her about the library hours.
output: O agricultor visitou a bibliotecária e perguntou-lhe sobre os horários da biblioteca.

src_ref: The librarian delivered books to the farmer and encouraged him to read more.
output: O bibliotecário entregou livros ao agricultor e o incentivou a ler mais.

src_ref: The assistant paid the driver and asked him to pay more attention.
output: O assistente pagou o motorista e pediu-lhe que prestasse mais atenção.

src_ref: The driver was annoyed with the assistant and asked her to never come back.
output: O motorista estava irritado com o assistente e a pediu para nunca voltar.

src_ref: The cleaner waited for the chief and talked to him about the missed payment.
output: O limpador esperou o chefe e conversou com ele sobre o pagamento atrasado.

src_ref: The chief waited for the cleaner and asked her for a better service.
output: O chefe esperou a limpa e pediu-lhe um melhor serviço.

src_ref: The teacher befriended the janitor and told him about school gossip.
output: O professor se tornou amigo do conserje e contou-lhe sobre os chismes da escola.

src_ref: The janitor befriended the teacher and told her about staff gossip.
output: O jardineiro se aproximou da professora e contou-lhe sobre o gossipe da equipe.
